articles.author: Eric Song
articles.title: The Best Black Friday Deals Start Now: Lowest Prices on PS5, Switch, Apple, LEGO, and More - IGN
articles.description: We made it to the biggest sale of the year. Dive into the best Black Friday deals of 2024, across games, consoles, tech, gadgets, toys and so much more.
articles.content: The Black Friday sales have now officially commenced! I've worked through numerous Black Fridays over the years, and my experience has always been the same: Black Friday actually starts on Thanksgivi… [+14595 chars]
